span.span: Represents an object that describes the customizations to the non-client area of a window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可讓您擴充 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 內容通常保留給作業系統的視窗管理員視窗之非工作區。The class enables you to extend Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) content into the non-client area of a window that is typically reserved for the operating system’s window manager. ## 標準的視窗Standard Windows 標準的視窗是由兩個重疊矩形組成。Standard windows are composed of two overlapping rectangles. 外部矩形是*非工作區*，這通常稱為*chrome*。The outer rectangle is the *non-client area*, which is often referred to as *chrome*. 它是繪製，而且受到作業系統的視窗管理員管理。It is drawn and managed by the operating system’s window manager. 維度是由標準作業系統設定決定。Its dimensions are determined by standard operating system settings. 用戶端框架提供標準的視窗功能與行為。The non-client frame provides standard window features and behaviors. 標題按鈕 （最小化、 最大化，並關閉），包括視窗框線，調整大小並移動行為，應用程式圖示和標題和系統功能表。These include caption buttons (Minimize, Maximize, and Close), the window border, resize and move behaviors, the application icon and title, and the system menu. 內部矩形*用戶端區域*。The inner rectangle is the *client area*. 它包含您的應用程式的內容，並繪製及管理的應用程式。It contains the contents of your application, and it is drawn and managed by the application. 如需 windows 中 WPF 應用程式的詳細資訊，請參閱[WPF Windows 概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-windows-overview.md)。For more information about windows in WPF applications, see [WPF Windows Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-windows-overview.md). 下圖顯示標準的視窗部分。The following illustration shows the parts of a standard window. ![視窗項目](~/add/media/windowoverviewfigure1.PNG "視窗項目")![Window elements](~/add/media/windowoverviewfigure1.PNG "Window elements") ## 自訂 WindowsCustom Windows 您可以藉由設定自訂視窗的框線屬性或使用類別。You can customize a window border by setting the property to or by using the class. ### WindowStyle.NoneWindowStyle.None 若要自訂 WPF 應用程式視窗的外觀的一種方式為設定屬性。One way to customize the appearance of a WPF application window is to set the property to . 這會從視窗中移除用戶端框架並離開只有用戶端區域，您可以套用自訂樣式。This removes the non-client frame from the window and leaves only the client area, to which you can apply a custom style. 不過，移除用戶端畫面格時，您也會遺失的系統功能和它所提供，例如標題按鈕和視窗大小調整行為。However, when the non-client frame is removed, you also lose the system features and behaviors that it provides, such as caption buttons and window resizing. 另一個副作用是最大化視窗將涵蓋 Windows 工作列。Another side effect is that the window will cover the Windows taskbar when it is maximized. 設定可讓您建立的完全自訂的應用程式，但也需要您實作自訂邏輯，在您的應用程式模擬標準的視窗行為。Setting enables you to create a completely custom application, but also requires that you implement custom logic in your application to emulate standard window behavior. ### WindowChromeWindowChrome 若要自訂視窗，同時保留其標準的功能，您可以使用類別。To customize a window while retaining its standard functionality, you can use the class. 類別視覺效果，從分隔視窗框架的功能，並可讓您控制用戶端與應用程式視窗的非工作區之間的界限。The class separates the functionality of the window frame from the visuals, and lets you control the boundary between the client and non-client areas of your application window. 類別可讓您藉由延伸來涵蓋非工作區的工作區，將 WPF 視窗框架中的內容。The class lets you put WPF content in the window frame by extending the client area to cover the non-client area. 同時，它會保留系統行為，透過兩個不可見的區域。*調整大小框線*和*標題*區域。At the same time, it retains system behaviors through two invisible areas; the *resize border* and *caption* areas. 有兩個主要部分，以建立自訂視窗使用類別。There are two main parts to creating a custom window using the class. 首先，您設定來自訂視窗的非用戶端部分公開屬性物件。First, you customize the non-client part of the window by setting properties exposed on the object. 然後您會提供範本定義的一部分延伸到非工作區的應用程式視窗。公開的屬性物件， ， ，和。Then you provide a template for the window that defines the part of your application that is extended into the non-client area.The properties exposed on the object are , , , and . 屬性會指定外部的使用者可以按一下並拖曳調整視窗大小的應用程式視窗中不可見的框線。The property specifies an invisible border around the outside of the application window that the user can click-and-drag to resize the window. 屬性會指定不可見區域上方的視窗，可讓一般標題列與相關聯的系統行為。The property specifies an invisible area at the top of the window that enables system behaviors typically associated with the title bar. 這些行為包括： 按一下並拖曳以移動視窗，以最大化視窗中，按兩下，以顯示 [系統] 功能表上按一下滑鼠右鍵。These behaviors include: click and drag to move the window, double-click to maximize the window, and right-click to show the system menu. 調整大小框線和標題區並沒有任何視覺化項目。它們只會定義可回應輸入，並啟用標準系統提供的視窗行為的區域。The resize border and caption area do not have any visual elements; they only define areas that respond to input and enable standard system-provided window behaviors. 屬性指定視窗的角落會四捨五入。The property specifies the amount that the corners of the window are rounded. 如果玻璃框架視窗啟用，則這個屬性並沒有任何作用。This property does not have any effect if the glass frame is enabled for a window. 屬性指定的視窗周圍的玻璃框架寬度。The property specifies the width of the glass frame around the window. 根據預設，它會使用所指定的系統值模擬標準視窗的外觀屬性。By default, it uses the system value specified by the property to emulate the appearance of a standard window. 使用玻璃框架時，標題按鈕的最小化、 最大化，並關閉是可見和互動。When the glass frame is used, the caption buttons for Minimize, Maximize, and Close are visible and interactive. 應用程式會負責顯示應用程式圖示和標題文字。The application is responsible for displaying the application icon and caption text. 您可以設定屬性使玻璃框架寬或較窄比預設值。You can set the property to make the glass frame wider or narrower than the default. > [!CAUTION] > 標題按鈕的大小不會變更當屬性變更。The size of the caption buttons does not change when the property is changed. 如果玻璃框架頂端的高度小於標題按鈕的高度，將無法完全可見標題按鈕。If the height of the top of the glass frame is less than the height of the caption buttons, the caption buttons will not be completely visible. 若要建立自訂視窗沒有玻璃框架，設定屬性，以統一的值為 0。To make a custom window that does not have a glass frame, set the property to a uniform value of 0. 這將會停用並隱藏標準標題按鈕。This will disable and hide the standard caption buttons. 若要擴充玻璃框架，以涵蓋整個視窗時，設定任一邊的負數值的屬性。To extend the glass frame to cover the entire window, set the property to a negative value on any side. 當屬性設定為任一側為負數，其強制型轉的值將會等於。When the property is set to a negative value for any side, its coerced value will be equal to . > [!NOTE] > Aero 是一組視覺增強功能的外觀和功能的 Windows Vista 中導入的 Windows 桌面。Aero is a set of visual enhancements to the look and functionality of the Windows desktop that was introduced in Windows Vista. Aero 更視覺化的方式特色是半透明效果視窗框線。One of the more visually obvious features of Aero is translucent glass window borders. Windows Aero 會啟用桌面轉譯緩衝處理 」 功能的桌面視窗管理員 (DWM)。Windows Aero is enabled by the desktop composition feature of the Desktop Window Manager (DWM). 所有的作業系統上不支援 Windows Aero 半透明效果，並可以停用受支援作業系統上。Windows Aero glass effects are not supported on all operating systems, and can be disabled on supported operating systems. 如果 Windows Aero 無法使用，玻璃框架將不會顯示不論屬性值。If Windows Aero is not available, the glass frame will not be displayed regardless of the property value. 這個屬性所指定的框線區域會改為黑色。請檢查屬性，以確認 Windows Aero 半透明效果可供使用。The border area specified by this property will appear black instead.Check the property to verify that Windows Aero glass effects are available. 如果無法使用保護的玻璃效果，您應該提供替代的視窗樣式不會使用玻璃框架或使用標準的視窗的視窗樣式設為 null。If glass effects are not available, you should provide an alternate window style that does not use the glass frame or use the standard window by setting the window style to null. 您藉由指定定義的外觀和行為的畫面格內容 ControlTemplate 將 WPF 內容延伸至視窗框架。You extend your WPF content into the window frame by specifying a ControlTemplate that defines the appearance and behavior of the frame content. 您要自訂視窗的型別設定 ControlTemplate 的 TargetType。You set the TargetType of the ControlTemplate to the type of the window that you are customizing. ``` ``` 根據預設，不是互動式的任何視窗的非工作區內的視覺項目組件。By default, the parts of any visual elements that are within the non-client area of the window are not interactive. 若要啟用的非工作區中的互動式項目，附加 WindowsChrome.IsHitTestVisibleInChrome 附加屬性的項目，並將它設定為 true。To enable interactive elements in the non-client area, attach the WindowsChrome.IsHitTestVisibleInChrome attached property to the element and set it to true. 下列 XAML 標記會顯示自訂視窗使用 WindowChrome 類別所需的主要項目。The following XAML markup shows the main elements needed to customize a window using the WindowChrome class. ``` ``` 第一個 setter 將 WindowChrome 附加至視窗。The first setter attaches the WindowChrome to the window. 它會使用所有預設值 WindowChrome 屬性，讓視窗看起來像標準的視窗。It uses all default values for the WindowChrome properties, which makes the window look like a standard window. ``` ``` 視窗範本必須指定內容的展示器，以顯示您的應用程式中所指定視窗的內容。The window template must specify a content presenter to display the contents of the window specified in your application. 依預設 WindowChrome 類別會擴充以涵蓋用戶端框線工作區。By default the WindowChrome class extends the client area to cover the non-client border. 找出玻璃框架，您需要指定 ContentPresenter 周圍的邊界。In order to uncover the glass frame, you need to specify a margin around the ContentPresenter. 這個標記所指定框線的周圍內容展示器模擬標準視窗的外觀是白色背景。This markup specifies a border with a white background around the content presenter to emulate the appearance of a standard window. 它也會指定繫結於 WindowNonClientFrameThickness 屬性取得的預設系統寬度框架的邊界。It also specifies a margin that is bound to the WindowNonClientFrameThickness property, which gets the default system width for the frame. ``` ``` 應用程式圖示和標題不會顯示由 WindowChrome 類別;他們必須加入至做為自訂內容的框線。The application icon and title are not displayed by the WindowChrome class; they have to be added to the border as custom content. 下列 XAML 會加入的映像和顯示圖示和標題 textblock。The following XAML adds an image and a textblock to display the icon and title. 這兩個項目繫結至對應的屬性視窗上。Both elements are bound to the corresponding properties on the window. 影像寬度是繫結至 SmallIconSize 寬度，就會取得預設的系統大小圖示。The image width is bound to the SmallIconSize width, which gets the default system size for the icon. IsHitTestVisibleInChrome 附加上設定屬性的映像，使其可以接收滑鼠事件。The IsHitTestVisibleInChrome attached property is set on the image so that it can receive mouse events. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性來指定的區域，使用者可以按一下並拖曳以調整視窗大小的寬度。Set the property to specify the width of the area where a user can click-and-drag to resize a window. 滑鼠指標會變更它移至 調整大小框線時，調整大小箭頭。The mouse pointer changes to resize arrows when it is moved over the resize border. 這個屬性可以設定任何非負數的雙精度浮點數值。This property can be set to any non-negative double value. 值可以是不一致。The values can be non-uniform. 根據預設，調整大小框線會使用系統值，來模擬行為的標準的視窗。By default, the resize border will use system values to emulate the behavior of a standard window. 這個區域只會用來定義用來調整視窗; 區域它沒有任何與其相關聯的視覺項目。This area is only used to define the region that is used to resize the window; it does not have any visual elements associated with it. 不過，會影響項目調整大小框線版面的配置。However, it does affect the layout of elements inside the resize border. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|
